hero.title: Freelance Java Developer | Backend Specialist
hero.subtitle: Delivering Scalable Solutions for Your Business
hero.description: Hi, I'm a results-driven freelance Java Developer with 4 years of experience helping clients build robust, scalable, and high-performing backend systems. I specialize in solving complex technical challenges, designing efficient microservices, and optimizing application performance to meet your business needs. My approach is client-focused, collaborative, and adaptableâ€”ensuring every project is delivered on time and exceeds expectations. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!
